name: CyberScape (Stefano_Gaming)
description: CyberScape is a fun and easy to learn infinite runner/platformer game where your goal is to break blocks and rebuild blocks as a defense and to build your way out of the undercity. This game was made for the Gdevelop Game Jam, and was created by Stefano_Gaming. It also was meant to be played in one sitting, and should take about 30 Minutes to an Hour, depending on how well you play.
